products.title: Basics Neoprene Dumbbell Hand Weights
products.description: 10 pound dumbbell (set of 2) for exercise and strength training. Neoprene coating in Navy Blue offers long lasting durability.Hexagon shaped ends prevent dumbbells from rolling away and offer stay-in-place storage. Nonslip grip promotes a comfortable, secure hold. Available in multiple sizes to mix and match for specific workout needs and to expand on over time. Printed weight number on each end cap and color coded for quick identification.
